name: Elena of Avalor
overview: The story of a brave teenager who has saved her kingdom from an evil sorceress and must now learn to rule as a crown princess until she’s old enough to be queen.
tagline: Becoming a leader will be her greatest adventure.

episodes.name: First Day of Rule
episodes.overview: On the day Elena officially becomes Crown Princess, she must rescue her sister Isabel from aboard a missing ship.

episodes.name: Model Sister
episodes.overview: Elena is torn between a promise she made to help Isabel and fulfilling her royal duties as crown princess.

episodes.name: All Heated Up
episodes.overview: Elena finds herself at odds with the Grand Council when dealing with a magical rock whose anger can trigger a “monfuego” eruption.

episodes.name: Island of Youth
episodes.overview: While the castle is preparing a surprise party for Esteban, Elena and Mateo take him sailing to an island where the Fountain of Youth is located. Elena and Mateo must save Esteban when he drinks too much water and becomes younger.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.overview: On the night Elena decides to appoint Mateo as Royal Wizard of Avalor, an evil malvago and old enemy of Alakazar named Fiero turns her family and the citizens to stone. Mateo must put his skills to the test to stop Fiero and save the people of Avalor

episodes.name: Prince Too Charming
episodes.overview: Elena visits the Kingdom of Cordoba to oversee construction of a bridge between it and Avalor but is convinced by lazy and spoiled Prince Alonso to shirk her royal duties. Elena must save the kingdom when the digging awakens a totem giant from Mayan folklore named the Yacalli.

episodes.name: Finders Leapers
episodes.overview: During an archeological dig, Esteban accidentally releases a mischievous duende, a magical elf-like creature based on Latino folklore, who sets out on a mission to unleash hundreds of other duendes on Avalor.

episodes.name: Royal Retreat
episodes.overview: Elena attends her first Royal Retreat as Crown Princess and learns that it is more important to do what is right than to fit in after a clashing disagreement with one of her fellow rulers.

episodes.name: A Day to Remember
episodes.overview: On Dia de los Muertos, Elena discovers her ability to see ghosts and sets out to help the spirit of a woman mend the rift between her grandchildren and save the family restaurant.

episodes.name: The Scepter of Light
episodes.overview: When a moth fairy tries to bring "the gift of eternal darkness" to Avalor during a solar eclipse, Elena must learn how to control the magic in her royal scepter.

episodes.name: Elena and the Secret of Avalor
episodes.overview: Elena laments how she was trapped in the magical Amulet of Avalor for forty-one years, until she was set free by a brave young Princess: Sofia The First.

episodes.name: Navidad
episodes.overview: Elena brings all the communities of Avalor together to share each other's holiday traditions. But when a Doña Paloma scheme causes an overly competitive atmosphere, Elena sets off on a traditional "parranda" and carols through the city to remind everyone of the true spirit of Navidad.

episodes.name: Olaball
episodes.overview: Elena helps coach Gabe when he joins Avalor's Royal "olaball" team despite being a terrible player.

episodes.name: Flight of the Jaquins
episodes.overview: Skylar is chosen to help train three young jaquins on defending the kingdom of Avalor.

episodes.name: Crystal in the Rough
episodes.overview: On Isabel’s first day of school, she tries changing herself in order to fit in on a field trip to the Crystal Caverns.

episodes.name: The Princess Knight
episodes.overview: Elena enters a fencing tournament disguised as "Knight Elezar" to prove that she is a great fencer.

episodes.name: Captain Turner Returns
episodes.overview: Naomi's mom gets a new job in their old kingdom. Naomi and Elena try to convince her not to move the family away from Avalor.

episodes.name: King of the Carnaval
episodes.overview: Esteban’s childhood friend, Victor, returns to Avalor during the kingdom’s Carnaval celebration and convinces Esteban to help him rob the royal treasury.

episodes.name: My Fair Naomi
episodes.overview: When Elena finds out that her best friend Naomi's sixteenth birthday is coming up, she decides to throw her a Royal Quinceanera at the palace! But when Naomi becomes obsessed with having the perfect party, their friendship is put to the test.

episodes.name: Spirit Monkey Business
episodes.overview: Elena must rescue Mateo when an unruly spirit monkey launches him into the Spirit World.

episodes.name: Wizard-in-Training
episodes.overview: Mateo takes on an apprentice, but soon discovers teaching is harder than it looks.

episodes.name: Realm of the Jaquins
episodes.overview: Elena travels to the realm of the jaquins, but unknowingly puts Avalor in danger.

episodes.name: The Gecko's Tale
episodes.overview: Elena and her sister Isabel must work together to help undo a curse when an explorer is turned into a gecko.

episodes.name: Party of a Lifetime
episodes.overview: Elena and her friends get stranded on a sailboat and are rescued by a mysterious ship.

episodes.name: Blockheads
episodes.overview: Elena and her friends are transformed into sculptures!

episodes.name: Masks of Magic
episodes.overview: Elena must work with Doña Paloma to break a spell.

episodes.name: The Jewel of Maru
episodes.overview: On Día de los Muertos, Elena meets a Maruvian ghost named Amaláy who stands watch over the powerful Jewel of Maru.

episodes.name: Royal Rivalry
episodes.overview: Elena invites a princess from a neighboring kingdom to Avalor hoping to repair an old alliance.

episodes.name: The Curse of El Guapo
episodes.overview: When Captain Sandoval retires, a skill competition is used to select his successor. Gabe is possessed by the spirit of a sword of a former General called El Guapo and acts like a jerk during the competition.

episodes.name: Three Jaquins and a Princess
episodes.overview: Isabel tries to prove that that she can handle more responsibility by looking after three baby jaquins by herself.

episodes.name: A Spy in the Palace
episodes.overview: While in disguise, Carla infiltrates the castle to try and steal Elena's mother's tiara.

episodes.name: Science Unfair
episodes.overview: Isabel enters the science fair with her friends but ignores Elena's advice about teamwork and tries to do everything herself.

episodes.name: Rise of the Sorceress
episodes.overview: Elena comes face-to-face with Shuriki in a magical battle and the evil wizard, Fiero, returns to join Shuriki on her quest to retake control over Avalor.

episodes.name: Shapeshifters
episodes.overview: Convinced that she must personally search for Shuriki, Elena shapeshifts into a jaquin but becomes framed for a crime she didn't commit.

episodes.name: The Scepter of Night
episodes.overview: After saving her kingdom from an evil sorceress, Princess Elena must prepare for her new role.

episodes.name: The Race for the Realm
episodes.overview: Elena races to Vallestrella to find the missing pieces of the Scepter of Night befor Shuriki can get her hands on them.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Scepters
episodes.overview: Elena returns to Vallestrella to receive training from three mystical sun birds on how to master her Scepter of Light.

episodes.name: Class Act
episodes.overview: Isabel takes her first class at the Science Academy with her favorite scientist, Professor Ochoa.

episodes.name: All Kingdoms Fair
episodes.overview: When Armando's older brother Santos comes to Avalor, Armando loses all confidence in his ability to run the All Kingdoms Fair.

episodes.name: A Lava Story
episodes.overview: When a female rock creature is unhappy, Elena enlists the help of Charoca to find out why before she causes a monfuego to erupt.

episodes.name: Song of the Sirenas
episodes.overview: While visiting her cousin who lives along the coast of Avalor, Elena encounters a group of mermaid-like sea creatures called sirenas and learns about their complicated history with humans. In an attempt to make amends, Elena befriends the sirenas and enlists their help to defeat evil sorceress Shuriki.

episodes.name: The Tides of Change
episodes.overview: When Elena attempts to get a Unity Pact signed between the humans and the sirenas, Daria enlists the help of evil shape-shifting dolphins called malandros to disrupt the peace.

episodes.name: The Return of El Capitán
episodes.overview: On Día de los Muertos, Elena and her abuelo team up with the spirits of two of his old friends, El Guerrero and El Místico, to complete a mission that they had started many years ago and were not able to complete.

episodes.name: Finding Zuzo
episodes.overview: When Zuzo goes missing in the spirit world, Elena enlists the help of other spirit guides to find him.

episodes.name: Snow Place Like Home
episodes.overview: A snowstorm threatens to ruin Elena’s plans of spending a quiet and peaceful Navidad at home.

episodes.name: Two Left Fins
episodes.overview: After being invited to attend his first Royal Retreat, Prince Marzel tries hard to impress and accidentally turns the visiting kings into Sirenas.

episodes.name: Movin' On Up
episodes.overview: When Elena invites Mateo to move into his own Royal Wizard quarters within the palace, his mother assumes she is invited to move in too.

episodes.name: Not Without My Magic
episodes.overview: While her magical scepter isn't working properly, Elena is forced to face a fire starting creature without her magic.

episodes.name: Luna's Big Leap
episodes.overview: Luna convinces King Verago to give her a shot at joining the King's Guard and gets partnered with a gruff jaquin named Tornado to show her the ropes.

episodes.name: Naomi Knows Best
episodes.overview: When Victor, Carla and Ash capture Elena and her friends, Naomi must trust her instincts to save them.

episodes.name: Sister of Invention
episodes.overview: Isabel tries to prove she's old enough to join Elena and her team when they set off on a mission to track down escaped villains Ash and Carla.

episodes.name: To Save a Sunbird
episodes.overview: After Elena discovers that Hool used up her life force to repair her scepter, she risks everything to save her friend.

episodes.name: Father-in-Chief
episodes.overview: On the day the new Chief of the Jaquins will be chosen, Migs must bring his three Jaquin kids to work.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Royals
episodes.overview: Things go awry when newly-elected Magister of Trade, Julio, decides to host his first Feast of Friendship and ancient magic shrinks all of the royal attendees.

episodes.name: Norberg Peace Prize
episodes.overview: Elena takes a trip to the Kingdom of Norberg to help their Queen resolve a dispute with a neighboring kingdom.

episodes.name: The Magic Within
episodes.overview: On the eve of Carnaval, Elena attempts to capture Avalor's most dangerous villain and falls into an ancient well of magic crystals, giving her new magical abilities.

episodes.name: Flower of Light
episodes.overview: When two mischievous spirits try to ruin Dia de los Muertos, Elena teams up with her childhood friend Felicia to travel to the spirit world and save the holiday.

episodes.name: Captain Mateo
episodes.overview: Mateo and Gabe's friendship is put to the test after Mateo is put in charge of the Royal Guard.

episodes.name: Sugar Rush
episodes.overview: When Elena is having trouble making time for family, Luisa convinces her to reopen the family chocolate shop.

episodes.name: The Family Treasure
episodes.overview: Elena and Isabel help two feuding brothers find a valuable treasure hidden by their mother.

episodes.name: Dreamcatcher
episodes.overview: When Elena's dreams magically start coming to life, she must confront the underlying feelings causing them.

episodes.name: Changing of the Guard
episodes.overview: Elena helps the Royal Seamstress follow her dream of becoming the first female member of Avalor's Royal Guard.

episodes.name: King Skylar
episodes.overview: When Skylar's father falls ill, he becomes king for a day and must learn what it takes to be in charge.

episodes.name: Spirit of a Wizard
episodes.overview: Mateo and Elena try to free Mateo's grandfather from an enchanted book.

episodes.name: Team Isa
episodes.overview: When Elena falls under the spell of a magical bandit named Tito, it's up to Isabel and her friends to save Elena and the kingdom.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh
episodes.overview: Naomi has second thoughts about her role on the Grand Council after her childhood friend, Veronica, visits.

episodes.name: Festival of Lights
episodes.overview: A royal family from the Latino Jewish kingdom of Galonia is shipwrecked off the coast of Avalor on their way home to celebrate Hanukkah, so Elena invites them to the palace to celebrate their cherished holiday and learn about their traditions.

episodes.name: The Birthday Cruise
episodes.overview: Elena throws a birthday party for Princess Chloe aboard the royal sailboat, but things go awry when they wash ashore a magical isle inhabited by a cursed sea nymph.

episodes.name: Giant Steps
episodes.overview: Naomi returns to Avalor to warn Elena about a growing magical threat to the kingdom.

episodes.name: Shooting Stars
episodes.overview: Elena and Isa learn what it takes to succeed at science when they must fix a telescope in time for their grandfather to see a rare comet.

episodes.name: Crash Course
episodes.overview: Gabe recruits a flashy wizard, Bronzino, to teach his guards magic, but learns that there are no shortcuts to success.

episodes.name: Sweetheart's Day
episodes.overview: When Armando tries to impress Marlena on Sweetheart's Day, he accidentally casts a spell that causes everyone in the town to start singing.

episodes.name: The Lightning Warrior
episodes.overview: Elena needs the help of two old enemies in order to free a new magical ally from a curse.

episodes.name: Día de las Madres
episodes.overview: After a revelation leaves Luisa doubting her mothering skills, Elena tries to rally her spirits on Mother's Day.

episodes.name: Heart of the Jaguar
episodes.overview: Quita Moz sees a prophecy about Isabel and sends her on a fantastic quest to find an object that will give her the courage to face anything.

episodes.name: Elena's Day Off
episodes.overview: With only a few days left until Elena's Coronation, Elena is forced to take a much-needed day off.

episodes.name: To Queen or Not to Queen
episodes.overview: When Elena wonders what her life would be like if she had not been born a princess, Zuzo casts a spell to show Elena an alternate reality.

episodes.name: Coronation Day
episodes.overview: On the day of Elena's coronation. Esteban releases Legendary Spirit misfits forcing Elena to journey to the spirit world to save her kingdom.
